description:
Arche is an ambitious Customer Service force that links Fortune 500 companies to their future customers. We develop effective ways to promote our client’s products and services. Face-to-face interactions with consumers allow us to build quality relationships which in turn generate a loyal customer base for our clients.

Every successful company has goals. At Arche, we revise our marketing plans bi-weekly in order to ensure our clients get the best results from us and that we achieve the goals we set. Our growth objectives allow us to take our clients' brands into fresh markets, offering an opportunity to gain access to customers in new regions of territory and promote their products. We have established great relationships with our clients, and we are highly motivated to gain a larger clientele platform soon.

Arche is eager to expand across the nation, and beyond. Starting only a few years ago, our office has grown from a handful of motivated associates to a dynamic sales and training force. Due to the high demand of skilled sales associates all over the globe, Elite has developed a Management Training Program. This program educates individuals looking to make a change in how the everyday person views branding a product for a company.

Responsibilities of the Retail Sales Associate:

  • Provide excellent customer service both in the office and during retail interactions
  • Cultivate and maintain brand awareness in the community
  • Assist with processes such as quote/contract generation for potential new leads
  • Support customer engagement through direct sales strategies
  • Stay up to date on clients' product offerings and new sales and customer service tactics
  • Attend daily meetings - attendance is required

Attributes for Success for the Retail Sales Associate:

  • Ethical and honest self-starter with a positive, proactive, ‘can-do’ attitude
  • The ability to follow through and prioritize
  • Must be available for immediate hire
  • Must be able to work full-time
  • Must be able to communicate well with others & enjoy working with people
  • Must be at least 18 years of age
  • Willing to work evenings and weekends when necessary
  • Be willing to cross-train in other positions
